pageContext.title: noFallthroughCasesInSwitch
pageContext.html:
Report errors for fallthrough cases in switch statements. Ensures that any non-empty case inside a switch statement includes either break or return. This means you wonâ€™t accidentally ship a case fallthrough bug.

// @noFallthroughCasesInSwitch
// @errors: 7029
const a: number = 6;

switch (a) {
  case 0:
    console.log("even");
  case 1:
    console.log("odd");
    break;
}
